Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Loyola
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Loyola due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Loyola due to police activity.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
